channel.title: Help with my runserver.bat and compile.bat
channel.description:
I need some serious help please, not just a few words, someone who is willing to go into detail. I am using the 'Only The Best' server, and have downloaded the files from that.
This is what it says when I edit my compile.bat:
To see what mine is, go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,77972.0.html then look towards the code near the end of the first post.
This is what my runserver.bat's edit looks like:
@echo off color 0a title Run "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java" client pause
If you spot anything wrong with them, please tell me!
---
When I want to compile my server, nothing happens, just a flash underscore appears.
When I want to run my server, I get this:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Press any key to continue...
What's happening here? :|
---
Also,
I can't find my javac.exe file. The only thing near to it is things like javacpl.exe or javacp.exe.
When I try to log into the server, I get:
Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own.
I just need help because there's so many errors around.

item.title: Help with my runserver.bat and compile.bat
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Uh, yeh. I have jre1.6.0 and jre1.6.0_01 if that’s any help.

I’ve downloaded both 5.0 and 6.0 though.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with my runserver.bat and compile.bat

item.title: Help with my runserver.bat and compile.bat
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

I need some serious help please, not just a few words, someone who is willing to go into detail. I am using the ‘Only The Best’ server, and have downloaded the files from that.

This is what it says when I edit my compile.bat:

To see what mine is, go here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,77972.0.html then look towards the code near the end of the first post.

This is what my runserver.bat’s edit looks like:

@echo off
color 0a
title Run
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin\java” client
pause

If you spot anything wrong with them, please tell me!

When I want to compile my server, nothing happens, just a flash underscore appears.

When I want to run my server, I get this:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Press any key to continue…

What’s happening here?

Also,

I can’t find my javac.exe file. The only thing near to it is things like javacpl.exe or javacp.exe.

When I try to log into the server, I get:

Error connecting to server. Must be down.
Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.

I just need help because there’s so many errors around.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with my runserver.bat and compile.bat
